byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and BEN PROTESS

abstract: Shares were halted for trading Monday, as the brokerage, led by Jon S. Corzine, prepared to sell some of its assets.
snippet: Shares were halted for trading Monday, as the brokerage, led by Jon S. Corzine, prepared to sell some of its assets.

headline.main: MF Global Said to Be in Deal Talks With Interactive Brokers
headline.print_headline: In Bid to Sell MF Global, Corzine’s Grip Is Said to Slip Further
